mapper.insert: insert into ST_H_GATE_R (ID, STCD, TM, EQPNO, Mode, RemoteStatus, MainPumpFault, BackupPumpFault, MainPumpRun, BackupPumpRun, Fault, FullOpen, FullClose, ChuanXiao, TuoXiao, LeftOpenValve, LeftCloseValve, RightOpenValve, RightCloseValve, LeftChuanXiaoValve, LeftTuoXiaoValve, RightChuanXiaoValve, RightTuoXiaoValve, LeftOpening, RightOpening) values (#{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{STCD,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{TM,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{EQPNO,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{mode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remoteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mainPumpFault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backupPumpFault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mainPumpRun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{backupPumpRun,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fault,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fullOpen,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fullClose,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chuanXiao,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tuoXiao,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leftOpenValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leftCloseValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rightOpenValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rightCloseValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leftChuanXiaoValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leftTuoXiaoValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rightChuanXiaoValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rightTuoXiaoValve,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{leftOpening,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rightOpening,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: select ID, STCD, TM, EQPNO, Mode, RemoteStatus, MainPumpFault, BackupPumpFault, MainPumpRun, BackupPumpRun, Fault, FullOpen, FullClose, ChuanXiao, TuoXiao, LeftOpenValve, LeftCloseValve, RightOpenValve, RightCloseValve, LeftChuanXiaoValve, LeftTuoXiaoValve, RightChuanXiaoValve, RightTuoXiaoValve, LeftOpening, RightOpening from ST_H_GATE_R
